articles.author: Kim Lyons
articles.title: NASA’s Curiosity rover has captured amazing images of clouds on Mars - The Verge
articles.description: NASA’s Curiosity rover captured images of clouds on Mars—“wispy puffs filled with ice crystals that scattered light from the setting sun.”  Clouds are rare in the thin atmosphere of Mars, forming at its equator during the coldest time of its year.
articles.content:
Shining, iridescent, noctilucent clouds as seen from the surface of the Red Planet
